text: Would that mean a set of font choices per section, AJ? Just want to make sure I'm understanding correctly.
Re: the source code, we've got that on our list :+1:
Not so much font choices as that could be set globally, but color/size would be helpful

not certain how I feel about global controls that affect all emails on an account(already don’t like some of them that exist) if they were local to the 1 email or overridable from the one email that’d be a different story
when it comes to html emails the less fighting with the email platform that I need to do in order to make my emails look good the better.
